entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
